definition: to begin/to initiate/to inaugurate/to start/to create
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The three leading cores have developed the unique theory of party building.
sentences.chinese: 黨的三代領導核心形成了各自獨創性的黨風建設理論。

sentences.english: The ingenious man received the prestigeous award for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 那位有獨創性的人首次接受這個具權威性的獎。

sentences.english: An innovative process-high gravity technology for nanometer material synthesis is presented.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種獨創性的納米材料合成方法即超重力法。

sentences.english: Creativity is the same thing as originality.
sentences.chinese: 創造力和獨創性是同一件事。

sentences.english: Visual attribute is the self-creation of Chinese painting with the premise of personal originality.
sentences.chinese: 直觀的自我屬性是中國畫創作具有個人獨創性的前提。

sentences.english: Of stylist Promethean reflect so that make a person cry in this space absolutely.
sentences.chinese: 設計師的獨創性在這個空間中體現得令人叫絕。

sentences.english: LI Shangyin was one of the greatest poets with artistic creativity in the history of Chinese poetry.
sentences.chinese: 李商隱是中國詩歌史上最富藝術獨創性的大詩人之一。

sentences.english: The clay figure is a work of great originality.
sentences.chinese: 這尊泥人是頗具獨創性的作品。

sentences.english: We are in the market for short stories of an original nature.
sentences.chinese: 我們歡迎有獨創性的短篇小說來稿。

sentences.english: He was brilliant, acclaimed for an ingenious thesis on ionized gases.
sentences.chinese: 他很聰明，他的有獨創性的關於電離氣的論文被讚揚。

sentences.english: This philosophy is not startling for its originality nor for its maturity.
sentences.chinese: 就其獨創性和成熟性而言，這一哲學並不令人喫驚。

sentences.english: Some of it is like, really creative and innovative.
sentences.chinese: 有一些確實很有獨創性。

sentences.english: The book embodies the results of his own original research.
sentences.chinese: 這本書體現了他獨創性研究的成果。

sentences.english: All good things which exist are the fruits of originality.
sentences.chinese: 存在於世的一切美好事物皆是獨創性的碩果。

sentences.english: I never heard anything more ingenious than your suggestion.
sentences.chinese: 我從來沒有聽見過象你這樣有獨創性的提法。

sentences.english: That is an extraordinary claim for the poem's originality.
sentences.chinese: 這也是一種對詩篇獨創性的獨特的宣告。

definition: to have a unique style of one's own (idiom)
